reviewText: I often love these more independent, sexy, vampire's movies, normally, the ones i love are often like that pulp literature we love reading and consuming, like a "guilty pleasure"!But, this one, besides featuring a few British actors (oh, were they truly "actors"?)who look pleasantly well for looking like some suburban hunks, you'd find probably gorgeous, if you were, let's say to be stuck, in Eastern Europe or even, in Scotland, without anything better to do than going to your closer Gay club on a Saturday night, after having desperately searched your Gay Guide, for something sinfully exciting to do! The movie, or whatever else, this thing may be defined by standards pretty unknown to me, is truly disappointing in whole other departments!The story lacks originality, and, the atmosphere is completely lacking at all, better to forget about the technical or "professional" aspects of this production, so we are left with some little story line that would probably make for an inept 120th episodes of some cable TV series, and, that just ends up leaving a series of plot holes, and, some very laughable moments, in a very forgettable contest, i honestly couldn't get passed through!This film is truly too pretentious for its own good.. and, budget! And, it shows painfully (aside from its poster!).There's nothing mysterious, nothing erotic, here, just a sense of "pervy" voyeurism, here and there, over a few lads who are handsome, without ever being that charismatic or film worthy!We are pretty much in the realm of another, sad misrepresentation of Cult movies meeting Gay culture: filmmaker (sorry cannot call him a director, after having patiently watched a few of his main works) David De Coteau's territory, a terrible Canadian producer and filmmaker, working however in Hollywood's lowest kitchens, more well known to be making 12 or more D grade little 'movies' every year, consistently filled with cheap CGI, while badly photographing and exploiting young men, often embracing their "paramours" for almost an hour and a half, in underwear! I always guessed where he's still able to find the 'models' willing to appear in such uninventive, trite, sad low budgets! Well, excuse me, for the digress, but, truly same and lame old story here, only with a British accent! Stay away!
summary: Gorgeous lads, but tawdry and rarely involving

reviewText: Hey it has hot handsome guys. a Decent plot and some graphics that are done surprisingly well.  Its like Twilight meets Dark Shadows meets Betwitched but only a lot more gay (which I prefer).  I really hope that they continue the story with a second one but this one is pretty darn good I think.
summary: Pretty good for a low end movie
